prod_short_desc: Knock out enemies with Ultimate Axl's gigantic fists!
prod_long_desc:
Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets are futuristic action minifigures with ultimate battle gear. Twist the ultra armor function on Ultimate Axl's back to move his gigantic fists, or attack with the magnetizer club. Then twirl enemies away with the spinning top with blades, or heroically jump into battle with an axe. This set features 3 scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game, and includes an Ultimate Axl minifigure.
Includes an Ultimate Axl minifigure.
Ultimate Axl merges live-action play with 3 scannable shields to obtain unique NEXO Powers for digital gaming.
Twist the ultra armor function to move the fists.
Weapons includes an axe and a spinning top with yellow blades.
Accessory elements include 2 attachable fists, a magnetizer club and a showcase stand.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 8-14.
Stands over 2” tall.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' or guardians' permission before going online.
Scan shields for each of the 3 NEXO Powers (Fist Smash, Magnetize and Stone Stun) and power up in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Collect and combine all the Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to boost your collection of ultimate battle gear.
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ episodes on Cartoon Network.
